    Function reference

    Data Summary

    Data Summary

    draw_normal()
    Draw a normal distribution plot using ggplot2.
    zround()
    Round and Format Numbers to Specific Decimal Places
    meanSD()
    Calculate Mean and Standard Deviation, and Format the Output
    range()
    Calculate and Format Range of a Numeric Vector
    count_percent()
    Calculate Counts and Percentages of Factor Levels

    Rmd functions

    Rmd functions

    rmd_knit_hook_set() rmd_knit_hook_set()
    Set custom knit hooks for R Markdown
    rmd_opts_chunk_set()
    Set default options for code chunks in R Markdown
    set_ggplot_theme()
    Set custom theme for ggplot2 plots
    zkbl()
    Format and style a table for LaTeX output
    print_table()
    Print a styled table for HTML or LaTeX output
    print_table_stripe()
    Print a styled LaTeX table with alternating row colors

    Tool functions

    Tool functions

    cleanFolder()
    Clean folder
    clip()
    Capture output and copy to clipboard
    sourceDir()
    Source all R scripts in a folder
